channel.title: How do i run a server on vista?
channel.description:
Ok, i dont know if im missing something, or if it's just my windows vista, the problem is that other people can't log on to my server when i have a no-ip, and still they can't log-in
i tried going to my friends house and logging in, but nothing, please respond on whether im missing something or its my vista
Also i turned server on, i have java, etc.

item.title: How do i run a server on vista?
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

Make sure you portforwarded 100%. I can walk you through it if you want.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i run a server on vista?

item.title: How do i run a server on vista?
item.dc:creator: @homiepkscape homiepkscape
item.description:
@homiepkscape wrote:

listen ok?

  1. no-ip. have it… make a host and choose a name… check the box next to your name in you no-ip.duc
    2.on your server, make sure that you can run and compile it.
  2. Make sure if your server has d claws that you and people who are on it have a client… for me i use a basic delta client… pkerslyfe client w00t go to the person who made that… love the backround… but back tp buisness next what i do to makesure the server is online i try to register my server on moparscape forums or use anywhere else… such as runelocus.com… ok if you need more help then email me at italiansoccerboy22@hotmail.com

Read full topic
item.source: How do i run a server on vista?

item.title: How do i run a server on vista?
item.dc:creator: @coco_zezima coco zezima
item.description:
@coco_zezima wrote:

Go port forward if already havent done.
Put your source online.
Use a client if needed.
And just login with aany user and pass.

item.description:
@b0b00wnz wrote:

I’m confused, i went to the “moparscape client” and as i look i don’t see, “Start Server”.
Plus how would this have anything to do with people not being able to go on my server?

I know… But when your server is online. Go on the moparscape client and click start server
